page.title: 18Social Concern,S'key&C'thrp.
page.content:
{New focus:}after demobilisation of army and air-force camps, village shops closed, pubs closed, school closed, chapel closed. Village Hall, built by voluntary labour, supplied new focus for village effort.
{Village pressure}on local government over: rights on Greens, marshes, sands and creeks; rights of way; street lighting; public transport (Community Bus now passes twice weekly through Stiffkey to Wells); to provide bus shelters for villagers and school- children. Dissatisfaction over: access to Health Services; housing; increase in weight and danger of traffic on roads.
{Charitable appeals}always meet with warm response.
